description: I am an Industrial Engineering major currently cooping with Coca-Cola Refreshments in midtown Atlanta.  From Gainesville, GA I am currently active in leadership positions in GT Ambassadors and SGA.  In my free time I enjoy playing music, working out, and exploring Atlanta.
aspects: Magic Carpet Ride, Semi Formal, Formal, Band Parties, Game days.
involve: GT Ambassadors - VP of External Affairs
quotes: "Organized sports are so fascist it makes me sick." - Baby Franco
name: Justin Luk
